summary: Spike a lev 10 vampire who has his soul back. He can use both 1 handed and 2 handed weapons, knows all sneak skills, and loves to torment his victims. He cannot die and is marriagable. He lives in Hall of the dead in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
My PC was hacked and i lost  all my main files so i had to remake Spike all over, I\'m sorry, I tried to put Liewe armor on him but for some reason he went bald. Go figure, so it should be in his inventory. If you don\'t like it, don\'t d/l it. Simple. 

Spike a lev 10 vampire who has his soul back. He can use both 1 handed and 2 handed weapons   knows all sneak skills, and loves to torment his victims.  He does not care how he kills, just that he can kill makes him happy. He cannot die and is marriagable. He lives in Hall of the dead in Whiterun. While i was testing him out he beat the crap out of a dragon, lol.

WARNING
You must have ApachiiHair running for this mod. Make sure it is before Buffy in the order.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

I Used:

For RED EYES, http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/83976

Apachii Hair of course   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Search duster on workshop search. U will come up with western hat. Duster is included.  THANK YOU Sauron_RoL  for your help.
author: Lycanheart
